headline: Allegro MicroSystems: Turnaround Potential Targeting $12 Billion Market Opportunity (Rating Downgrade)
summary: Allegro MicroSystems is in a turnaround phase under new CEO Mike Doogue, focusing on innovation and SAM expansion. Read why ALGM stock is a Hold.
